p.k: Rinaldo by Haendel at the Festival de Peralada. Réalisateurs: Sebastien Berge (2018).
p.d:
Rinaldo, opera in three acts by Georg Friedrich Haendel (1685 - 1759) Libretto by Giacomo Rossi after Torquato Tasso's 'Gerusalemme liberata' First performance in London, Queen's Theater, February 24, 1711 Concert version
Vespres d'Arnadi Orchestra, Dani Espasa (Conductor) Xavier Sabata (Rinaldo), Núria Rial (Almirena), Hillary Summers (Argante), Mary-Ellen Nesi (Armida), Juan Sancho (Goffredo), Josep Ramón Olivé (A Magician, A Herald).
Recorded on August 5, 2018 at the Carmen Church as part of the Festival Castell de Peralada Réalisé par Sébastien Bergé
